name: Champions of Thora
description:
Presentation


Embark on a journey as the four chosen champions of the Goddess Thora, in an ultimate fight against her son, Ganga.
The Evil Lord who seeks to destroy the world as everyone knows it to create one anew. Only you stand in his way!

Features


  • Dynamic Party System, play through different character perspectives
  • 7 Special Dungeons to explore
  • Dozens of Rare Items to be found
  • Three difficulty modes for both acommodation and replayability
